cast.name: 维尔日妮·埃菲拉 Virginie Efira

this_title: Kalahari, l'autre loi de la jungle Season 1
introduction: Wander the vast, inhospitable lowlands of Africa’s Kalahari Basin, where an extraordinarily diverse array of animals, from massive elephants to tiny weaver birds, work together to find resources, protect their young, and survive the harsh conditions.Episodes include…1. Into The Heat2. Pushed To The Limits3. Behind The Lens
